segments.text: You've been sneezing a lot lately . Are you sick or something ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . Every spring time around April , I'm stricken with allergies .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , as you just saw , I sneeze a lot . Also , my nose becomes very runny , my throat sometimes itches , and my eyes start to water .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , it's not . So you don't have any type of allergies ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I have a severe allergic reaction to alcohol . It runs in the family .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Everyone to some extent is allergic to alcohol .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I get it pretty bad . My whole face turns red , including my ears . My eyes become bloodshot , and I start to itch all over my body .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But that doesn't stop me from drinking . Ahahah .
segments.speaker: S2
